channel.title: AncientScape Enhanced : The Server
channel.description:
Okay, some of you may heard of an old server called AncientScape which had 85+ members on hosted by me, right? Now it is turning into a great project made by me. [b]AncientScape Enhanced[/b]. I just started today and I have got some decent stuff in.
[u]Updates[/u]
[i]No cheat client party hat spawning will work.[/i] [i]Range has been fully removed.[/i] [i]Several items like a perfect ring, white, and black have been given needed requirements to fit their riggness. Only the owner can wear a perfect ring and only administrators can wear white and black.[/i] [i]Some item commands have been added.[/i]
[b]Not much yet, just started. Getting all the starting stuff together. Like menu's, and all the like.[/b]
[u]Future Updates (not in any order)[/u]
[i]Make it so if people log on to the server while in beta test that aren't supposed to they will get disconnected.[/i] [i]A minigame called H.A.M. vs M.A.H..[/i] [i]Barrows the real way.[/i] [i]A lot of 100% working skills.[/i] [i]Perhaps add a real Runescape quest or two.[/i] [i]Fix some glitches.[/i] [i]Add some more commands and stuff.[/i]
[b]I would have more, but I need ideas for new skills and minigames. Please post here with ideas and they will be put into consideration. Thank you.[/b]
If you want to beta test, post here! The server will be officially out on all of the server lists in a week or two. But until then, you can still secretly play on the server in beta test. [u]Up to 4 people can beta test and you must have AIM or MSN.[/u]
[b]It also has a server site hosted with GoDaddy and a .org domain which will be released after it is out of beta testing.[/b]
[img]http://www.gameunit.org/yes.bmp[/img]

item.title: AncientScape Enhanced : The Server
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

I pmed you Sleep.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientScape Enhanced : The Server
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

[quote=“Nets8, post:5, topic:115304”][quote author=Sleep link=topic=164560.msg1534781#msg1534781 date=1182583047]

Never mind. I won’t do that because people can share the password the same way they can share the server IP, so I’ll just leave it as it is. Good idea, though. Get me some more ideas XD

New Future Update: Perhaps add a real Runescape quest or two.

Why does the key have to be open for everyone to use? What I meant was that once someone enters the key it is nulled and if that key is entered again both of the players are IP banned. I know that is harsh but it’s going to keep the people from trying to share keys.
[/quote]

Or I can just make it if the person’s name isn’t one that I want to log on it will disconnect them.[/quote]
People can always send a fake packet to the server and use that second or two of the server checking the packet to brute a username in that is on your list … I’m just thinking that the CD Key type auth would be more secure.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientScape Enhanced : The Server
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

It’s okay dude. We all make mistakes.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientScape Enhanced : The Server
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

Make an auth system.

So you can publically release it, but only certain people have access to play. (I saw the idea from Sam Server via Rune-Server.)

Make an Auth class that will require any new player that logs in to enter a four digit (or however many digits you want, kind of like a CD KEY) to play if they cannot enter it or the key is not on the list they automatically get jailed. It’s a pretty self explanatory system + it would keep out people that you don’t want to be in there when the Beta is up.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientScape Enhanced : The Server
item.dc:creator: @Nets8 Nets8
item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

Okay, some of you may heard of an old server called AncientScape which had 85+ members on hosted by me, right? Now it is turning into a great project made by me. AncientScape Enhanced. I just started today and I have got some decent stuff in.

Updates

No cheat client party hat spawning will work.
Range has been fully removed.
Several items like a perfect ring, white, and black have been given needed requirements to fit their riggness. Only the owner can wear a perfect ring and only administrators can wear white and black.
Some item commands have been added.

Not much yet, just started. Getting all the starting stuff together. Like menu’s, and all the like.

Future Updates (not in any order)

Make it so if people log on to the server while in beta test that aren’t supposed to they will get disconnected.
A minigame called H.A.M. vs M.A.H…
Barrows the real way.
A lot of 100% working skills.
Perhaps add a real Runescape quest or two.
Fix some glitches.
Add some more commands and stuff.

I would have more, but I need ideas for new skills and minigames. Please post here with ideas and they will be put into consideration. Thank you.

If you want to beta test, post here! The server will be officially out on all of the server lists in a week or two. But until then, you can still secretly play on the server in beta test.
Up to 4 people can beta test and you must have AIM or MSN.

It also has a server site hosted with GoDaddy and a .org domain which will be released after it is out of beta testing.
